Class CommentDAO

java.lang.Object
app.tracktune.model.comments.CommentDAO
All Implemented Interfaces:
DAO<Comment>
public class CommentDAO extends Object implements DAO<Comment>
Data Access Object (DAO) implementation for Comment entities. Handles CRUD operations and queries related to comments and their replies in the database.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Description

    Constructs a new CommentDAO with the specified DatabaseManager.

      Specified by:

      Returns:

      Throws:
      SQLiteException - if the database operation fails

    • insertReply

      public void insertReply(int commentID, int replyID)
      Inserts a reply relationship between two comments in the Interactions table.
      Parameters:
      commentID - the ID of the original comment
      replyID - the ID of the reply comment
      Throws:
      SQLiteException - if the database operation fails

    • updateById

      Parameters:
      comment - the Comment entity with updated values
      id - the ID of the Comment to update

      SQLiteException - if the database operation fails

    • deleteById

      public void deleteById(int id)
      Deletes a Comment and all its replies recursively by the Comment ID.
      Specified by:
      deleteById in interface DAO<Comment>
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the Comment to delete
      Throws:
      SQLiteException - if the database operation fails

    • getAllReplies

      public List<Comment> getAllReplies(int commentId)
      Retrieves all replies to a given Comment.
      Parameters:
      commentId - the ID of the Comment whose replies to fetch
      Returns:
      a list of Comment replies
      Throws:
      SQLiteException - if the database operation fails

    • getAllCommentByResource

      public List<Comment> getAllCommentByResource(int resourceId)
      Retrieves all top-level comments for a given resource (track). Only comments which are not replies are returned.
      Parameters:
      resourceId - the ID of the resource (track)
      Returns:
      a list of top-level Comment entities associated with the resource
      Throws:
      SQLiteException - if the database operation fails
